caption.p: Purification of CHKVmab from Nicotiana benthamiana leaves. Total soluble proteins were extracted from plants, and CHKVmab was purified and analysed on a 4%–20% gradient SDS‐ PAGE gel under reducing (Lanes 1–4) or non‐reducing (Lanes 5 and 6) conditions and visualized with Coomassie stain. Lane 1, protein molecular weight marker; Lane 2, leaf soluble proteins after low pH precipitation; Lanes 3 and 5, CHKVmab purified from leaves; Lanes 4 and 6, mammalian cell‐produced anti‐ WNV E16 mAb as a reference standard. HC: heavy chain, LC: light chain, ( HL) 2: assembled mAb with two light and heavy chains. One representative of several independent experiments is shown.
